instructions: Image titled Clear Data on WhatsApp Step 6 1 Open the WhatsApp app. Image titled Clear Data on WhatsApp Step 7 2 Tap . It's in the upper-right corner of the screen. Image titled Clear Data on WhatsApp Step 8 3 Tap . Image titled Clear Data on WhatsApp Step 9 4 Tap . Image titled Clear Data on WhatsApp Step 10 5 Tap . Image titled Clear Data on WhatsApp Step 11 6 Tap . Doing this deletes the messages contained in all chats on the device.
